summary: WHEN THE GAS PEDAL WAS PRESSED, THERE WAS A DELAY IN ACCELERATION.  THE CONSUMER HAD TO PUMP THE GAS PEDAL TO GET THE VEHICLE TO MOVE.  IT WAS LATER DETERMINED THAT THE THROTTLE WAS DIRTY.  A FAULTY RESISTOR CAUSED THE BLOWER TO ONLY WORK ON HIGH.  THE LEFT FRONT DOOR PANEL FELL OFF.   *JB   *NLM
